title: Chemometrically-aided general approach to novel adsorbents studies: Case study on the adsorption of pharmaceuticals by the carbonized Ailanthus altissima leaves
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Jevrem Stojanović, Maja Milojević-Rakić, Danica Bajuk-Bogdanović, Dragana Ranđelović, Miroslav Sokić, Biljana Otašević, Anđelija Malenović, Aleksandra Janošević Ležaić, Ana Protić
